column4: i've set up ndiswrapper for my Linksys card, and when i do the command ndiswrapper -l i get the following result:
yet, the card still won't work. any suggestions?
does it light up when you modprobe ndiswrapper?
does lsmod | grep ndiswrapper show it's laoded?  does iwconfig show a wireless interface?
please prepend my nick so iyour messages are highlighted for me
does lsmod | grep ndiswrapper show it's loaded?
replace i with a small L :)
ok, it's loaded.  have you blacklisted bcm43xx?
yes, otherwise it's likely to use that over ndiswrapper.  just to confirm, does lsmod | grep bcm43xx return anything?
that will prevent it from loading at boot.  you can unload it now and try ndiswrapper again
you might not even need to restart, just try reloading ndiswrapper
